> <OLD>
>
> Perceptor and Windlord took legacy's shuttle and departed towards their
> destination

<NEW>

As they enter the shuttle, they can see that it is far more advanced
than any they have seen on Earth. The ship quickly scanned them and at
their orders started up.

It took only a short while for the shuttle to quickly bring them to
the coordinates provided it.

The shuttle circled around a small volcano, smoke and vapors venting
from the top. The shuttle's sensors still continued to show two
PREDACON signatures. They were inside a cave somewhere at the base of
the volcano.

(TAG)

- Preston
